name: 2024 The 7th International Conference on Big Data and Education
content: Conference Proceedings: Accepted papers of ICBDE 2024 after proper registration and presentation will be published in the ICBDE 2024 conference proceedings by ACM. Conference content will be submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex and Scopus. ICBDE 2024 ISBN: 979-8-4007-1698-0
